mapper.select: SELECT LOWER_ORGANIZATION FROM ORGANIZATION WHERE UPPER_ORGANIZATION is Null
SELECT LOWER_ORGANIZATION, UPPER_ORGANIZATION FROM ORGANIZATION WHERE UPPER_ORGANIZATION is NOT Null
SELECT LECTURE_CODE, U.USER_ID, U.USER_NAME, LECTURE_NAME, LOWER_ORGANIZATION FROM LECTURE L INNER JOIN USERS U ON(L.USER_ID=U.USER_ID)
SELECT USER_ID, ATTEND_NO, LECTURE_CODE FROM ATTEND WHERE USER_ID=#{user_id} AND LECTURE_CODE=#{lecture_code}

SELECT DECODE(GROUPING(copy_t.tm1),1,'Total',copy_t.tm1||'~'||copy_t.tm2) AS TIME , NVL(SUM(main_t.cnt),0) AS NOA , LECTURE_CODE FROM ( SELECT TO_CHAR(CONNECTION_TIME, 'hh24') tm, COUNT(*) cnt, A.LECTURE_CODE FROM LECTUREACCESSSTATISTICS L INNER JOIN ATTEND A ON(L.ATTEND_NO=A.ATTEND_NO)
WHERE CONNECTION_TIME >= to_date(#{start_date},'yyyymmddhh24miss') AND CONNECTION_TIME <= to_date(#{end_date},'yyyymmddhh24miss') AND LECTURE_CODE=#{lecture_code} GROUP BY TO_CHAR(CONNECTION_TIME, 'hh24'),A.LECTURE_CODE ) main_t , ( SELECT LPAD(LEVEL -1, 2, '0') tm1 , LPAD(LEVEL + 0, 2, '0') tm2 FROM dual CONNECT BY LEVEL <= 24 ) copy_t WHERE copy_t.tm1 = main_t.tm(+) GROUP BY ROLLUP((copy_t.tm1, copy_t.tm2)), LECTURE_CODE ORDER BY copy_t.tm1
SELECT U.USER_NAME, P.USER_ID FROM PROFESSOR P INNER JOIN USERS U ON(P.USER_ID=U.USER_ID)

SELECT DECODE(GROUPING(copy_t.tm1),1,'Total',copy_t.tm1||'~'||copy_t.tm2) AS TIME , SUM(main_t.cnt) AS NOA FROM ( SELECT TO_CHAR(PORTAL_VISIT_TIME, 'hh24') tm , COUNT(*) cnt FROM PORTALACCESSSTATISTICS
WHERE PORTAL_VISIT_TIME >= to_date(#{start_date},'yyyymmddhh24miss') AND PORTAL_VISIT_TIME <= to_date(#{end_date},'yyyymmddhh24miss') GROUP BY TO_CHAR(PORTAL_VISIT_TIME, 'hh24') ) main_t , ( SELECT LPAD(LEVEL -1, 2, '0') tm1 , LPAD(LEVEL + 0, 2, '0') tm2 FROM dual CONNECT BY LEVEL <= 24 ) copy_t WHERE copy_t.tm1 = main_t.tm(+) GROUP BY ROLLUP((copy_t.tm1, copy_t.tm2)) ORDER BY copy_t.tm1
SELECT OPENSEME_YEAR, OPENSEME_SEMESTER, OPENSEME_NO FROM OPENSEMESTER ORDER BY OPENSEME_YEAR DESC, OPENSEME_SEMESTER DESC

SELECT COUNT(DECODE(LECTURE_COURSETYPE,'전공',1)) MAJOR_CNT, COUNT(DECODE(LECTURE_COURSETYPE,'교양',1)) NONMAJOR_CNT, COUNT(LECTURE_NAME) LECTURE_CNT, sum(LECTURE_CURRENT)LECTURE_CURRENTSUM FROM LECTURE WHERE OPENSEME_NO=#{openseme_no}
AND LOWER_ORGANIZATION=#{lower_organization}

SELECT OPENSEME_YEAR, OPENSEME_SEMESTER, openseme_no, TO_CHAR(OPENSEME_PERIOD1,'YYYYMMDD') OPENSEME_PERIOD1, TO_CHAR(OPENSEME_PERIOD2,'YYYYMMDD')OPENSEME_PERIOD2 FROM OPENSEMESTER
WHERE TO_CHAR(openseme_period1,'YYYYMMDD')<=#{today} AND TO_CHAR(openseme_period2,'YYYYMMDD')>=#{today}
